neonatal seizures
How many people are affected by benign familial neonatal seizures ?,"Benign familial neonatal seizures occurs in approximately 1 in 100,000 newborns.",GHR,benign familial neonatal seizures
What are the genetic changes related to benign familial neonatal seizures ?,"Mutations in two genes, KCNQ2 and KCNQ3, have been found to cause BFNS. Mutations in the KCNQ2 gene are a much more common cause of the condition than mutations in the KCNQ3 gene.  The KCNQ2 and KCNQ3 genes provide i
